alert.note: Alert for Custer; Dewey; Major; Washita; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 1:18AM CST until December 13 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Southeastern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Custer County in western Oklahoma... Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Western Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 200 AM CST. * At 118 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Cestos to 4 miles northwest of Putnam to 6 miles west of Clinton to 5 miles north of Sentinel, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Taloga, Burns Flat, Thomas, Seiling, Arapaho, Dill City, Canute, Custer City, Butler, Bessie, Foss, Oakwood, Mutual, Putnam, Foss Reservoir, Quinlan, Orion, Chester and Cestos. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Dewey; Major; Washita; Woods; Woodward
